name: Peer Images Wear - Watch Game
description:
Match the images. To do this, click on the question mark and the image will appear, memorize and search for the couple. A timer is available to see how much time you need to overcome the challenge

There are 2 difficulty levels:
Normal -> Matrix of 4 x 4, 8 pairs to find.
Difficult -> Matrix of 6 x 6, 18 pairs to find.

Play a game on the Apple Watch!
